title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using valid credentials and receive a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is successful and JWT token is received.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure that login fails when using incorrect username/email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails and an appropriate error message is shown.

title: Create New Project
description: Verify that a project manager can create a new project with client linkage, timeline, segments, and financial details.

steps.description: Navigate to the 'New Project' page.
Fill in all required project fields including client selection, timelines, segments, and budgets.
Submit the project creation form.
Verify the project is created, saved in the database, and visible in the project list.

title: Edit Existing Project
description: Verify the ability to update details of an existing project including schedule, segments, and financial info.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing project details page.
Edit the project’s timeline, segments, and financial details.
Save the changes.
Verify that the updates are persisted and reflected correctly in the project summary.

title: Delete a Project
description: Verify that a project manager can delete an existing project and that it is removed from the system.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing project details page.
Perform the delete action and confirm the deletion.
Verify that the project no longer appears in the project list and associated data is cleared.

title: Schedule Teams and Machinery Using Drag-and-Drop Calendar
description: Verify coordinators can assign teams and machinery to projects using the interactive calendar with drag-and-drop functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to the Pavement Scheduling calendar.
Drag a team or machinery item onto a calendar date/time slot.
Modify schedule by dragging to another slot.
Verify the schedule updates correctly and persists in the system.

title: Daily Work Report Submission with Photo Upload
description: Verify field teams can submit daily progress reports including photo evidence, materials used, equipment status, and weather conditions.

steps.description: Navigate to the daily reports submission page.
Fill in work progress details, materials used, equipment info, weather data.
Upload photo evidence.
Submit the daily report.
Verify the report is saved and displayed in daily reports list.

title: Attendance and Overtime Calculation
description: Verify the system calculates daily attendance and automatic overtime for collaborators and generates accurate payroll reports.

steps.description: Navigate to the Daily Work Control attendance page.
Input attendance time and extra hours for collaborators.
Save the attendance records.
Verify overtime is correctly calculated and reports reflect the correct values.

title: Manage Machinery Registration, Insurance, and Maintenance
description: Verify complete CRUD operations for machinery items including registration, insurance details, licenses, fuel consumption, and maintenance records.

steps.description: Navigate to machinery management page.
Create a new machinery record with all required data.
Verify machinery appears in the list with correct details.
Edit the machinery data.
Verify updates are saved and reflected.
Delete the machinery record.
Verify the record is removed from the system.

title: Client Profile Creation and Project History Verification
description: Verify that clients can be created with full profile information and their associated project histories are accurately displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to client management module.
Create a new client with all necessary profile details.
Verify the client profile is saved and displayed.
Associate projects with the client.
Check that client’s project history is correctly shown.

title: Accounts Payable Invoice Management and Alerts
description: Verify full accounts payable flows including invoice creation, payment processing, due date tracking, and automatic alert generation.

steps.description: Navigate to Accounts Payable module.
Create a new invoice with payment and due date details.
Verify invoice is stored and listed correctly.
Mark invoice as paid.
Check payment status updates and related KPIs.
Verify automatic alerts trigger near invoice due dates.

title: Real-Time Dashboard KPIs and Alert Accuracy
description: Verify that the executive dashboard displays real-time KPIs, productivity charts, and alerts reflecting current data from multiple modules.

steps.description: Navigate to the Executive Dashboard.
Validate KPIs and graphs correspond to recent project and financial data.
Trigger an alert condition (e.g., delayed project) and verify alert appears in real-time.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that system roles (project manager, coordinator, finance personnel) have access only to permitted modules and actions, enforced via RLS and authorization.

steps.description: Log in as a project manager and attempt to perform coordinator-only operations.
Verify access is denied to coordinator-only actions.
Log in as finance personnel and try to access project management pages.
Verify access is restricted as per role.

title: Offline Mode Data Access and Sync
description: Verify PWA offline capabilities allowing read access to cached data and queuing changes to sync automatically once connection is restored.

steps.description: Go offline and navigate through cached pages such as project lists and dashboards.
Verify data is accessible and consistent without network.
Perform data changes offline such as adding notes or reports.
Reconnect to network and verify queued changes sync correctly.
Verify no data loss or conflicts occur after sync.

title: Service Catalog CRUD Operations
description: Validate creation, update, listing, and deletion of paving services including pricing and unit control.

steps.description: Navigate to service catalog.
Add a new service with price and unit.
Confirm new service is listed correctly.
Update the service details.
Verify updates are saved and displayed.
Delete the service.
Confirm the service is removed from the catalog.

title: Export Reports to Excel and PDF
description: Verify users can export custom and standard reports in Excel and PDF formats with proper formatting and data accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to report generation page.
Generate a report with specified parameters.
Export the report to Excel.
Verify the Excel file downloads and contains correct data.
Export the same report to PDF.
Verify the PDF file downloads and formatting is correct.

title: Collaborator Status and Document Management
description: Verify collaborator CRUD including uploading documentation, status changes, team assignments, and vacation tracking.

steps.description: Create a new collaborator with necessary personal and contract info.
Upload related documents such as ID and contracts.
Set collaborator status and assign to a team.
Update vacation and absence records.
Verify all data is saved and visible in collaborator detail view.

title: Supplier Pricing and Payment Tracking
description: Validate supplier management features including pricing tables, receiving RR2C loads, and tracking payments for suppliers.

steps.description: Create or edit a supplier with contact and contract details.
Manage pricing tables and update costs for materials.
Record RR2C loads received.
Track and update payments made to suppliers.
Verify correct association between loads, pricing, and payment statuses.

title: Security: JWT Token Expiry and Refresh
description: Verify that JWT tokens expire as expected and the refresh token mechanism allows session continuation without manual login.

steps.description: Log in and obtain a JWT token.
Simulate token expiry.
Ensure access is denied after expiry.
Use refresh token to obtain a new JWT.
Verify that a new token is received and session continues without re-login.

title: Performance: Load Time under 3 Seconds on 4G
description: Verify that critical pages such as Dashboard, Project List and Scheduling load completely within 3 seconds on simulated 4G networks.

steps.description: Using network throttling, simulate 4G condition.
Navigate to Dashboard page.
Verify full page load time is under 3 seconds.
Navigate to Project Management page.
Verify full page load time is under 3 seconds.
Navigate to Pavement Scheduling calendar.
Verify full page load time is under 3 seconds.

title: Error Handling: Invalid Data Entry in Forms
description: Verify appropriate validation error messages are displayed when submitting invalid or incomplete data in forms throughout the system.

steps.description: Open any form (e.g. new project, new client, new report).
Submit the form leaving required fields empty or entering invalid data formats.
Verify validation errors are shown and submission is blocked.

title: Push Notifications for Alerts
description: Verify that push notifications are sent and displayed correctly for system alerts such as upcoming due invoices, project delays, and new messages.

steps.description: Configure browser to accept push notifications.
Trigger a system alert like an invoice due date within notification timeframe.
Verify the push notification is received and shown while user is active/inactive on the app.

title: User Notes with Markdown and Advanced Filtering
description: Verify users can create, edit, and delete notes with markdown formatting, and filter/search notes based on categories and keywords.

steps.description: Navigate to the notes section.
Create a new note with markdown content.
Verify note is saved and renders markdown correctly.
Apply filters or search terms.
Verify results match filters/search.
Delete a note.
Verify note is removed from the list.
